question: We quickly pull on the free-hanging thread at the bottom of the mass. Which thread will break? See image below.

answers.feedback: Correct. $ma = mg + T_2 − T_1 \Rightarrow m(a−g) = T_2 − T_1$. Force balance given. If $a<g$, then $T_2<T_1$, and the top thread will break first. If $a>g$, then the bottom thread will break first.
